byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Kate Pastor, Tatiana Schlossberg, Nate Schweber and Daniel E. Slotnik.

abstract: Gunman at Ingersoll Houses in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, shoots and kills Lacount Simmons, Calvin Clinkscales and Herbert Brown; shooting ends homicide-free period of over a year at the housing project, once considered one of New York City's most violent public housing complexes.
lead_paragraph: The attacks, in Brooklyn, the Bronx and East Harlem, came on Saturday night and early Sunday, the authorities said, with one of the episodes occurring in a spot where crime has dropped recently.

headline.main: 7 Killed in Shootings Across New York City
headline.print_headline: 7 Killed in Weekend Shootings; a Setback in an Anti-Crime Effort

snippet: The attacks, in Brooklyn, the Bronx and East Harlem, came on Saturday night and early Sunday, the authorities said, with one of the episodes occurring in a spot where crime has dropped recently.
